title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
